abstract: John Palfrey, head of Phillips Academy in Andover, Mass, reports to faculty, staff and alumni that five former faculty members, including Stephen Wicks and author Alexander Theroux, engaged in sexual misconduct with students in 1970s and '80; Palfrey, who offered formal apology to victims, indicated prospect of more evidence coming to light and more findings being made public.

headline.print_headline: Ex-Faculty Members Accused of Abuse at Phillips Andover
headline.main: Investigation Finds Phillips Andover Faculty Engaged in Sexual Misconduct With Students

snippet: Three former faculty members were named by the head of the elite prep school after an investigation by a law firm, which examined cases from the 1970s and ’80s....
lead_paragraph: Three former faculty members were named by the head of the elite prep school after an investigation by a law firm, which examined cases from the 1970s and ’80s.
